messages.message:
Brian
I need your help.
Andrew Turner accepted your request.
Really? With what do you need MY help?

Brian
Because you a member of Atheist Beings, you must be intelligent.
Thank you. What was it you needed help with?

Brian
I stopped going to Impact Church because my pastor Travis told me I'm not allowed to use the word Karma.  I find this to be intolerant.
What is impact church?

Brian
A new age church in Phoenix.
Ah I see...a reinvention of the old fairy tales?

Brian
You could say that.
So what help exactly do you need? You already took action due to recognising intolerance

Brian
Ha.  I am so spiteful, I want to change their minds.
Do you think it would be possible? You can lead a horse to water but you can't make it drink. Same with theists, you can show them how ridiculous faith is...

Brian
I can show them.
And how would you go about that?

Brian
Can you tell me?
How to convince the brainwashed?

Brian
Yes
Well you could start at the beginning, with all the contradictions and fallacies in genesis

Brian
Do you understand the time in which God works?  I think genesis is happening in reverse.
https://science.slashdot.org/story/16/09/23/2149233/our-atmosphere-is-leaking-oxygen-and-scientists-dont-know-why
Our Atmosphere Is Leaking Oxygen and Scientists Don't Know Why - Slashdot
The Earth's atmosphere has been leaking oxygen and scientists don't know why. Researchers discovered that over the past 800,000 years, atmospheric oxygen levels have dropped by 0.7 percent. How exactly did they discover the leak? By observing ice cores from Greenland and Antarctica, which contain tr...
science.slashdot.org

Brian
Nothing in genesis says 800,000 years
How do they know it has been leaking that long? And how would they have measured it?

Ok...what I am getting at is this, I am assuming you have read the article you posted. I am assuming that you understand the implications of it. Mainly that, the biblical timeline does not fit in with the actual time tile. So when I said start with genesis you dove straight in and gave an example of why genesis is wrong

Brian
I think Genesis is happening in reverse.  Also I think the bible applies to individuals.  Imagine Jesus never existed (I know that won't be hard for you).  When did you have this profound Revelation in your life?

That it was all just stories created by man? When I looked into it with an open mind. The thing is, I wanted to believe, but the more I read the bible the less faith I had, I continued to read until all faith had gone. Say I told you I believed in Odin, that he created everything, would you accept it or tell me I was wrong?

Brian
I would say Odin is just like my God.   But just to mess with you   It feels like God is gone to me, in that I have to act like God in order to feel him.  Church and reading the bible never helped me with this.  Or it helped me get to the realization that it doesn't matter what I think.

Brian
I feel like telling people I am atheist just to hear them defend themselves.  I think this is common for the group so thank you for reaching out!
I don't have anything to defend. I got to where I am through logic and reason. Lol. I just refute the claim the bible makes. Anytime you want a chat, feel free to message me

Brian
Thank you sir, I'll think of a harder question for you
No problem, I welcome the challenge...but, what happens when all of your questions have been answered?

Brian
I'll know everything.  Who does that sound like?
What you will KNOW will be the same as every atheist. Lol

Brian
http://www.wopg.org/the-keys/
THE KEYS - Words of Peace
Knowledge Learn to access the experience of peace and fulfillment “What I offer is more than words. I offer the know-how to access the experience of peace and fulfillment within. I call it Knowledge.” Prem Rawat Prem Rawat offers a way to discover peace within called Knowledge. The Keys are a series...
wopg.org
